author: Daniel Nasaw
title: New Trump Immigration Order: What’s Changed? - Washington Wire - WSJ
text:
President signed a new order limiting entry into the U.S. from a handful of Muslim-majority countries over national security concerns. The order would replace one signed Jan. 27, and is intended in part to ameliorate legal issues that led federal courts to pause the order almost as soon as it left the president’s desk. Here […]
